caseTitle: Suo Motu Regarding Holding of General Elections to the Provincial Assemblies of Punjab and Khyber Pakhtunkhwa v.
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: (1) Scope of jurisdiction under Article 184(3) during pendency of the same matter before the High Courts; (2) Constitutional bar on exercising original jurisdiction under Article 184(3) against a judicial pronouncement of a High Court; (3) Applicability of res judicata to a decision of a High Court made under Article 199; (4) Federalism - High Courts' jurisdiction to decide upon matters relating to Provinces; (5) Political dialogue - the best way to resolve political issues; (5) Need of making rules for regulating the exercise of jurisdiction under Article 184(3) and constitution of Benches.
